name: UPRENE UXA-307
description:
UPRENE UXA-307 is a polyurethane emulsion used for adhesion. Especially, this product is suitable for production of decorated plywood because it excels in adhesion
with polyvinylchloride sheet and plywood/canvas, and has excellent creep resistance. And this product is able to be used as an adhesion (creep resistance) improver by blending it to resin emulsion type adhesion such as anion/nonionic type EVA, acryl, SBR and vinyl acetate.
